name: Morning Star Girls
description:
The year is 2007, the earth is now a deserted wasteland and two sisters are trying to survive in this post-apocalyptic world. Armed with powerful weapons based on the deadly Morning Star, the girls make their own rule in this world !

Game made in 2 days for the A Game By It's Cover 2015 by Tribute Games employees during our yearly game jam. You should check out our newest game, Curses 'N Chaos !

Johan Vinet: Art & Music
Justin Cyr: Art & SFX
Michael Larouche: Programming

Keyboard controls

CTRL - Attack
SPACE - Jump
TAB - Switch character

Gamepad controls

Square / X - Attack
Cross / A - Jump
R1 / RB - Switch character
